name: Steven Barre
body:
## Profile
I am a diligent, thorough, and detail oriented Linux Systems Administrator. I possesses strong knowledge in Red Hat based systems, MySQL and derivative databases, and PHP based web applications. I have a proven ability to maintain customer facing web, database, and email servers. Experience with OpenStack, Chef, and cloud hosting. I am an eager and motivated learner.

## Certifications
* Red Hat 7 Certified Engineer - March 2015
* Red Hat 6 Certified Engineer - November 2011
* Red Hat 5 Certified Technician - July 2010

## Education
Information Technology Applied Systems Diploma  
Malaspina University/College — April 2006 —  Graduating top of my class
